Text: I can't seem to find the Installer. When I open the rar and extract, all I get is a folder with the same rar in it, and when I extract that as well, I still get no installer.

The Jar file located inside the rar is known as an executable jar file. After installing Java, the Jar file will execute exactly like an exe. You are going to need to install Java in order to play Minecraft anyways.
Ah, sorry, I had to update to the new java. It didn't notify me, sorry for the trouble.

@nexiumcore i never played a cracked minecraft so  what am i dong wrong? I extract minecraft multi version and then get the little install window to pop up. i choose the latest snapshot and click install game and it says "Could not install build." i tried multiple times with no success plz help
You also have to extract the "builds" folder and place it in the same directory.
Can't Login for a strange reason
Logins are expected to fail. Click play offline to play.
This is great, good job on the torrent

In the next release or two I will be making the program more dynamic so you can choose only to download the versions of Minecraft that you want. With every new release of Minecraft this program will get bigger, and therefore run some people off because of the shear size. I just want everyone to know that I will be fixing this problem shortly.
